content: **knitted jumper with raglan in drops paris the piece is worked top down with lace pattern sizes xs - xxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no w-805 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl **materials** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 400-400-450-500-550-600 g colour 21 mint green **knitting gauge ** 16 stitches in width and 20 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 5 5 mm drops circular needle size 5 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm for stocking stitch drops double pointed needles size 4 5 mm drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm for rib needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
